name: Jumping Jack (itch) (jort93)
description:
A very simple platformer inspired by the google chrome dinosaur game, made for the NOKIA 3310 JAM 2. Hold up to jump and hold down to drop more quickly. Try and dodge all the obstacles and get a high score. 

My first game made in godot, didn't spend much time on it. My girlfriend made most of the artwork.

In case the sound of the browser version is glitching for you, try the windows version, it runs much more smoothly.
I have not tested Linux, android and mac OSX builds.
